remMethod.val: poly (多) + glot (声门； 语言) → 多种语言的

trans.tranCn: 通晓数种语言的人；用通晓数种语言记载的书
trans.tranOther: A polyglot is a person who speaks or understands many languages

trans.tranCn: 通数国语言，数国语言的
trans.tranOther: Polyglot is used to describe something such as a book or society in which several different languages are used
